attributes.additional_details:
Scratch cards have a prize structure which include the lowest prize being the same as the cost of entry e.g. for a £1 entry you can win a £1 prize.

As no one would consider getting your money back a prize, this prize is a device to achieve a lower odds chance of winning a prize, which serves to deceive players of their chance of receiving more back than they ventured.

This petition is to change the law for the minimum prize to be at least double the.entry fee.
